title: Plugin_202203222520598
cpl.readme:
; Todolist
Todolist is a small pure wikitext plugin, for creating todo lists and interstitial journaling. Todolist gives you the confidence that everythingâ€™s organized and accounted for, so you can make progress on the things that are important to you.

You can also make to-dos for major tasks like a project, a work assignment or an overall goal. Therefore, the overall purpose of creating a to-do is to remember tasks and prioritize them.

//Interstitial journaling// is a productivity technique created by Tony Stubblebine. Itâ€™s the simplest way to combine note-taking, tasks, and time tracking in one unique workflow (See [[NessLabs|https://nesslabs.com/interstitial-journaling]]).

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Todolist/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Todolist
